channel.title: Webclient error.. What is wrong.[Updated]
channel.description:
So I used Ric's webclient tutorial (best one there is.). The download site (In class 44 method 67) is my public dropbox meaning anyone can access it for the download. I have everything done, the jar is signed and created correctly. For some reason it does the Client Updated - Please Reload client. then it does the count down thing. Can someone help?
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/123.png[/img]
I don't get the error :(

item.title: Webclient error.. What is wrong.[Updated]
